meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, L1FN Auditorium and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the minutes for the January 14, 2025 Meeting
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes for the January 14, 2025 City of Dallas Housing Finance Corporation Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Approval of the minutes for the January 16, 2025 Special Meeting
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes for the January 16, 2025 City of Dallas Housing Finance Corporation Special Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Consider and Adopt an Inducement Resolution
agenda_items.description: Consider and Adopt an Inducement Resolution declaring intent to issue bonds, in an aggregate principal amount not to exceed $35,000,000, for a loan to Lincoln Avenue Communities to provide financing for a senior residential development for persons of low and moderate income to be known as 'Baraboo Hills Apartments' and to be located at 6200 Baraboo Drive, Dallas, Texas 75241.

agenda_items.title: Consider and approve the Dallas HFC 2025 meeting schedule
agenda_items.description: Consider and approve the Dallas HFC 2025 meeting schedule.

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion of DHFC Treasurer’s report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of DHFC Treasurer’s report for the twelve-month period ending on December 31, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report as of February 11, 2025.

financial_items.description: Loan to Lincoln Avenue Communities for Baraboo Hills Apartments
